title: PODCAST 8-23-2018: The War on Weapon States, with Michael Youhana
description:
I'm joined by Michael Youhana to discuss his recent piece for the Fellow Travelers Blog, "Ending the War on Weapon States." We talk about what constitutes a Weapon State, how the War on Weapon States has impacted post-Cold War US foreign policy, and how to think about WMD and "rogue states" without falling into the usual Blob b******t. Apologies for a couple of spots where the audio is rough, one of us was fighting a lousy internet connection and the Skype quality suffered for it.

You can find Michael's Fellow Traveler's piece here.

Follow Michael on Twitter: @Michael_Youhana
